examples.example: 我们都要保持健康的生活方式，这样才能享受美好的人生。

translate.english: We all should maintain a healthy lifestyle so that we can enjoy a wonderful life.

examples.example: 经常运动有助于我们保持健康的身体和积极的心态。

translate.english: Regular exercise helps us maintain a healthy body and a positive mindset.

examples.example: 我们应该注重饮食和运动，以维持身体的健康。

translate.english: We should pay attention to diet and exercise to maintain the health of the body.
